2.desc: On a device in the corner of the control room.

4.desc: On a desk in the overseer's office on the upper floor.

5.desc: On a stack of metal boxes in the lower floor of the factory building.

2.label: No More Games
2.desc: On a stack of wooden beams.

4.desc: On a desk in the control room.

1.label: Gold Pocket Watch
1.desc: On a stack of steel beams.

1.label: Rifle Workbench
1.desc: In the Resistence armoury. Can be accesses via a ladder behind @link[door.1|this door.].

desc.1: Option A - Destroy generator with satchel charge.
desc.2: Option B - Overload the pressure valves (0/2).

1.label: On the Hunt
1.desc: An armoured car is patrolling near the shipping warehouse.

2.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

3.label: Resistance Cache
3.desc: There is a Resistance armoury somewhere in the casting facility.

1.label: Door to the Resistance Armoury
1.desc: Can be opened by picking the lock or with bolt cutters.

2.desc: Requires the @link[key.2] or a satchel charge.
